statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

article.headline: Texas A&amp,M-Corpus Christi 68, Texas St. 59
article.story: SAN MARCOS, Texas -- Kevin Palmer scored 15 points, 12 of them at the free-throw line, as Texas A&M-Corpus Christi defeated Texas State 68-59 Wednesday night. Justin Reynolds scored 14 points for the Islanders (7-8, 2-0 Southland), Terence Jones had 11 and Demond Watt had 10 points and seven rebounds. Cameron Johnson led Texas State (7-9, 1-1) with 13 points and nine rebounds. Ryan White had 12 points. Texas A&M-Corpus Christi led 34-22 at halftime, with half of the Islanders' points coming off 16 Bobcat turnovers. Texas State finished with 21 turnovers. The Islanders had a 45-27 lead with 14 1/2 minutes to play, but Texas State went on an 11-0 run. The Bobcats trailed 58-55 with under two minutes remaining before Texas A&M-Corpus Christi sealed the victory, making five free throws in the final minute.
